Caption:
5 years as an Army Combat Medic.
7 years in automotive finance at Toyota.
Now I build websites and automations.

Weird path? Maybe.

But here's what carried over:

→ Staying calm when everything's on fire
→ Explaining complicated things without jargon
→ Following through, no matter what

Clients don't hire me for my résumé.
They hire me because when I say it'll get done, it gets done.

Caption:
People ask how I went from Army medic to building websites.

Honestly? It's not that different.

In the Army, you assess the situation, prioritize what matters, and execute under pressure. In finance, you learn to translate complex stuff into plain English. In development, you take a problem and build the solution.

Different skills. Same mindset: figure it out and get it done.

That's the whole philosophy behind needthisdone.com.

Caption:
Hot take: AI doesn't replace expertise. It amplifies it.

I use AI tools every day. They help me work faster and catch things I'd miss.

But here's what AI can't do:

→ Understand what your business actually needs
→ Make judgment calls when requirements conflict
→ Build relationships and trust over time
→ Take ownership when something goes wrong

The strategy is human. The quality control is human. The accountability is human.

AI is the tool. I'm the craftsman.

Caption:
I'll be honest about something: I use AI every single day in my work.

But probably not the way you think.

AI helps me move faster. It catches typos. It suggests solutions I might not have considered. It's like having a really smart assistant who never sleeps.

What it doesn't do? Make decisions. Understand your business. Take responsibility.

That's still me. That's always going to be me.

When you hire needthisdone.com, you get cutting-edge tools guided by real human judgment. That combo is what actually gets results.
